column1: Le Port is a commune in the French overseas department of Réunion. It is located at the extreme northwest corner of the island of Réunion. It has a population of 36
column2: 952. It is the main harbor city of the island.

column1: This is the town where the Communist Party of Réunion usually gets most of their votes. Also
